body.p: Having concluded to Join the State Guard, I therefore respectfully tender you my resignation as Third Lieutenant of the Enrolled Militia of this the (Milton) district.
Hoping that you will accept of the same immediately I remain with great respect Yours to Command

George Terrill
Trimble Co
Resignation of 3rd Lt E. M
June 21. 1861
